definition: Rock Records, Taiwanese record label/the Rolling Stones, British rock band/Rolling Stone (magazine)
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Moss does not cling to rolling stone.
We murmur alike reproachfully rolling sands and drift, knowing not why.
sentences.chinese: 我们貌似低语却在申斥滚石漂移，不知道累。

sentences.english: The rock-and-roll band came out with a new record.
sentences.chinese: 滚石乐团推出一张新唱片。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, we all know that "a rolling stone gathers no moss".
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们知道“滚石不生苔，转业不聚财”。

sentences.english: In 1950, Muddy Waters recorded a song called "Rollin' Stone".
sentences.chinese: 在1950年，沃特斯录制了一首歌，名为“滚石”。

sentences.english: "Life" is the autobiography of Rolling Stones guitarist Keith Richards.
sentences.chinese: “人生”是滚石乐队吉他手基思理查兹的自传。

sentences.english: Guitarist Keith Richards from the Rolling Stones organized the concert.
sentences.chinese: 滚石吉他手基思理查兹举办的演唱会。

sentences.english: He had seen the Rolling Stones with his own eyes. And it felt so good.
sentences.chinese: 他亲眼看到了滚石乐队的演出，一场棒极了的表演。

sentences.english: A comprehensive controlling idea of rockfall hazards was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出边坡滚石灾害综合防治的思路。

sentences.english: You're such a bigshot journalist, writing for Rolling Stone.
sentences.chinese: 你是一个多么风光的记者，为滚石乐队创作。

sentences.english: I see the anguished poetry scribbled on the wall bystoned teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 我看见墙上滚石少年的抒发痛苦的诗歌。

sentences.english: Rolling Stone proclaimed her "Teenager of the Year" in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年，滚石杂志称赞希拉蕊为年度最佳青少年。

sentences.english: Do you like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢甲壳虫和滚石乐队吗？

sentences.english: It is a huge adamellite rolling rock.
sentences.chinese: 神仙居为一巨型二长花岗岩滚石。

definition: Cui Jian (1961-), father of Chinese rock music
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
